person.persName: Henry J. Lyons (Assistant Quarter Master General)

body.p: Born on January 7, 1828 in Washington D.C. In 1860, worked at a bank exchange in Louisville. Was the assistant Quarter Master General of Kentucky in 1861. Died on April 11, 1867 in Louisville, Kentucky.
